text: Taksim Surp Harutyun Church (), is an Armenian Church located on Beyoğlu Manucipality of Istanbul. The original date of first construction is not known but the church was removed in 1846, closed down in 1890 and rebuilt in 1895 by the architects Hovhannes and Mıgırdiç Esayan. == References == Category:Armenian Apostolic churches in Istanbul Category:Armenian buildings in Turkey
title: Taksim Surp Harutyun Church
